properties.Name: OrderActivity
properties.Description: A specific Order-Related Activity performed by an Employee in conjunction with an Order.

Columns.Name: OrderActivityTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Order Activity.

Columns.Name: ActivityStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The actual start timestamp for the Order Activity.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: ActivityEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The actual end timestamp for the Order Activity.

Columns.Name: ActivityCompletedIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the Order Activity is completed.

Columns.Name: OrderActivityStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Order Activity Status.

Columns.Name: ResponsibleEmployeeId
Columns.Description: Engine Product The unique identifier of an Employee.

Columns.Name: Note
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the Order Activity.
